\ottrulehead{{ \mathit{out}_A }}{::=}{\ottcom{output function}}}

\newcommand{\ottcopyoutXXpbl}{

\newcommand{\otteXXsem}{

\newcommand{\ottparsXXsem}{

\newcommand{\ottctrlXXsem}{

\newcommand{\ottarchXXsem}{

\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXlookup}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}  = \mathrm{lookup_v} ( \overrightarrow{\gamma} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L ,  \ottnt{varn} ) }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \,  \overrightarrow{\gamma}  \vdash (  \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{varn}  ) \rightsquigarrow  (  \ottnt{v}  ,   [ \, ]   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_lookup}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXcallXXnewframe}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{lookup\_funn\_sig\_body} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{funn}  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ \forall i \leqslant n. \, ((d_i \in \{\circ , \downarrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_const} \, e_i ) \land (d_i \in \{\updownarrow , \uparrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_var} \, e_i)) }%
\ottpremise{ \gamma'  = \mathrm{copyin} ([x_1 , \; .. \; , x_n] , [e_1 , \; .. \; , e_n] , [d_1 , \; .. \; , d_n] ,  \ottsym{,}  , \overrightarrow{\gamma} ) }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \,  \overrightarrow{\gamma}  \vdash (  \ottkw{call} \, \ottnt{funn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ) \rightsquigarrow  (  \ottkw{var} \, \ottkw{star}  ,   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt} )}_{ \ottsym{[}  \gamma'  \ottsym{]} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_call\_newframe}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXcallXXargs}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{[}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{lookup\_funn\_sig} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{funn}  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ i = \mathrm{min} \, \{ j . \,\,  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [j]  \in \{\circ , \downarrow\} \wedge \neg ( \mathrm{is\_const} \,  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  [j] ) \} }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{=}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \,  \overrightarrow{\gamma}  \vdash (  \ottnt{e}  ) \rightsquigarrow  (  \ottnt{e'}  ,  \overrightarrow{\Phi}  ) }%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  =   ( i  \mapsto   \ottnt{e'} )  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \,  \overrightarrow{\gamma}  \vdash (  \ottkw{call} \, \ottnt{funn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ) \rightsquigarrow  (  \ottkw{call} \, \ottnt{funn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ,  \overrightarrow{\Phi}  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_call\_args}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXsXXacc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

{\ottdrulename{e\_s\_acc}}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXle}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{bitv} \, \ottkw{LE} \, \ottnt{bitv'}  \ottsym{=}  b}%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \,  \overrightarrow{\gamma}  \vdash (   \ottnt{bitv}    \leq    \ottnt{bitv'}   ) \rightsquigarrow  (  b  ,   [ \, ]   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_le}}{}%
}}

{\ottdrulename{e\_ge}}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXneqXXerror}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXneqXXbool}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXcompOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \overrightarrow{\Phi}''  \neq [ \, ] }%
\ottpremise{ t'  \neq { \mathbf{Ret \, v} } }%
\ottpremise{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [  \Phi  ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  \ottsym{,}  \overrightarrow{\Phi}'  \ottsym{,}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}    [  \Phi  ]   {+}\mspace{-8mu}{+}  \overrightarrow{\Phi}''   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  \ottsym{,}   \overrightarrow{\Phi}'  {+}\mspace{-8mu}{+}  \overrightarrow{\Phi}''   \ottsym{,}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_comp1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXcompTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt''} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{ret} \, v }   \ottsym{)} }%
\ottpremise{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}''  =  \ottsym{(}    \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L   \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \overrightarrow{\gamma}'   \ottsym{)}  [  \ottkw{star}  \longmapsto  \ottnt{v}  ] }%
\ottpremise{\gamma_G  \ottsym{=}  \overrightarrow{\gamma}''  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\gamma_G'  \ottsym{=}  \overrightarrow{\gamma}''  \ottsym{[}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\overrightarrow{\gamma}'''  \ottsym{=}   \mathrm{tl}  \ottsym{(}   \mathrm{tl}  \overrightarrow{\gamma}''   \ottsym{)} }%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{stmt'''}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{lookup\_funn\_sig\_body} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{funn}  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ (  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  ,  \overrightarrow{\gamma}'''' ) =  \mathrm{copyout} \, ( [x1, \, .. , \, xn] , [d1, \, .. , \, dn] ,  ..  , \overrightarrow{\gamma}'' , \overrightarrow{\gamma} ) }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}    [   ( { \ottnt{stmt} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   {+}\mspace{-8mu}{+}     [   ( { \ottnt{stmt'} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}' }^{ \ottnt{funn'} }   ]   {+}\mspace{-8mu}{+}  \overrightarrow{\Phi}     \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  \ottsym{,}    [   ( { \ottnt{stmt'} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}'''' }^{ \ottnt{funn'} }   ]   {+}\mspace{-8mu}{+}  \overrightarrow{\Phi}   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_comp2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXassXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}'  =  \ottsym{(}    \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L   \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \overrightarrow{\gamma}   \ottsym{)}  [  \ottnt{lval}  \longmapsto  \ottnt{v}  ] }%
\ottpremise{\gamma_G  \ottsym{=}  \overrightarrow{\gamma}'  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\gamma_G'  \ottsym{=}  \overrightarrow{\gamma}'  \ottsym{[}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\overrightarrow{\gamma}''  \ottsym{=}   \mathrm{tl}  \ottsym{(}   \mathrm{tl}  \overrightarrow{\gamma}'   \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  \ottnt{lval}  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  \ottnt{v}  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}   [  \gamma_G ,  \gamma_G'  ]   \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}'' }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_ass\_v}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXseqOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{1}}}} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  \ottsym{,}   \overrightarrow{\Phi}  {+}\mspace{-8mu}{+}   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}' }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]    \ottsym{,}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)} }%

 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{2}}}} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  \ottsym{,}   \overrightarrow{\Phi}  {+}\mspace{-8mu}{+}   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{2}}}} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}' }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]    \ottsym{,}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXseqTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{stmt} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXseqThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXcondTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXdecl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

{\ottdrulename{stmt\_decl}}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXinit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}'  = \mathrm{initialise} (   \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L   \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \overrightarrow{\gamma}  ,  x ,  \ottnt{v} ) }%
\ottpremise{\gamma_G  \ottsym{=}  \overrightarrow{\gamma}'  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\gamma_G'  \ottsym{=}  \overrightarrow{\gamma}'  \ottsym{[}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\overrightarrow{\gamma}''  \ottsym{=}   \mathrm{tl}  \ottsym{(}   \mathrm{tl}  \overrightarrow{\gamma}'   \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( { \ottkw{decl} \, t \, x \, \ottnt{v} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}   [  \gamma_G ,  \gamma_G'  ]   \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}'' }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_init}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXblockXXenter}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\overrightarrow{\gamma}'  \ottsym{=}   \overrightarrow{\gamma}  \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \ottsym{[}   {\gamma}_{ \emptyset }   \ottsym{]} }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  \{  \ottnt{stmt}  \}  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}' }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_block\_enter}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXblockXXexec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  \ottsym{,}   \overrightarrow{\Phi}  {+}\mspace{-8mu}{+}   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt'} )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}' }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]    \ottsym{,}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   \overrightarrow{\Phi}  {+}\mspace{-8mu}{+}   [   ( {  [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}' }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]    \ottsym{,}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_block\_exec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXblockXXexit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\overrightarrow{\gamma}'  \ottsym{=}   \mathrm{rev} ( \ottsym{(}   \mathrm{tl}  \ottsym{(}   \mathrm{rev} ( \overrightarrow{\gamma} )   \ottsym{)}   \ottsym{)} ) }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ]  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma}' }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_block\_exit}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{

{\ottdrulename{stmt\_verify\_4}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXapplyXXtableXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \mathrm{Tb}\,  tbl \, =\, (  \ottnt{e'}  \, ,  \mathit{mk}  ) }%
\ottpremise{ \mathrm{ctrl}\, (  tbl  , \,  \ottnt{v} , \,  \mathit{mk} \, ) = \,(  f  ,  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ) }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  \mathbf{apply} \,  tbl  \,  \ottnt{v}  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}   [   ( {  \ottkw{null}  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  )}_{ \overrightarrow{\gamma} }^{ \ottnt{funn} }   ]   \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXext}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXin}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{inp}  \ottsym{=}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \overline{io}''  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  { \mathit{in}_A }  \ottsym{(}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_p }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_p }  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L ,   { [ \; ]_A }  ,  { C } ,    { \mathbf{run} }   ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{+}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}''  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }'  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L ,   { [ \; ]_A }  ,  { C } ,    { \mathbf{run} }   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_in}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXparserXXinit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{pbl} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{parser} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{stmt} \, P  \ottsym{=}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ x  = ``\mathit{start}" }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{=}  P  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\gamma'  \ottsym{=}  { \mathit{in}_p }  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\gamma_G''  \ottsym{=}   \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L   \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'   \ottsym{=}     [  \gamma_G''  ]    \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \ottsym{[}  \gamma'  \ottsym{]} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}  = \mathit{NoError} }%
\ottpremise{ x'  = \mathit{parseError} }%
\ottpremise{  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L''   = \mathrm{initialise} (  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  ,  x' ,  \ottnt{v} ) }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_p }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_p }  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L ,   { [ \; ]_A }  ,  { C } ,    { \mathbf{run} }   ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'' ,   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{stmt'} )}_{  {[\;]}  }^{ f }   ]  ,  { C } ,    { \mathbf{run} }   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_parser\_init}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXcontrolXXinit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{pbl} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%

\ottpremise{\gamma'  \ottsym{=}  { \mathit{in}_p }  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\gamma_G''  \ottsym{=}   \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L   \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'   \ottsym{=}     [  \gamma_G''  ]    \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \ottsym{[}  \gamma'  \ottsym{]} }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_p }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_p }  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L ,   { [ \; ]_A }  ,  { C } ,    { \mathbf{run} }   ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L' ,   [   ( { \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{stmt'} )}_{  {[\;]}  }^{ f }   ]  ,  { C } ,    { \mathbf{run} }   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_control\_init}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXffbl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\ottpremise{ t  \neq \mathit{pars\_fin} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  P  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}  \overrightarrow{\Phi}  \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  {\longrightarrow}_{p}  \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  \ottsym{,}  \overrightarrow{\Phi}'  \ottsym{,}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_p }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_p }  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L ,  \overrightarrow{\Phi} ,  { C } ,   t  ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L' ,  \overrightarrow{\Phi}' ,  { C }' ,   t'  ) }{%

\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L  \ottsym{,}  \overrightarrow{\Phi}  \ottsym{,}  { C }  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{run} }   \ottsym{)}  {\longrightarrow}_{c}  \ottsym{(}  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L'  \ottsym{,}  \overrightarrow{\Phi}'  \ottsym{,}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }%

 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_p }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_p }  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L ,  \overrightarrow{\Phi} ,  { C } ,    { \mathbf{run} }   ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L' ,  \overrightarrow{\Phi}' ,  { C }' ,   t'  ) }{%

\ottpremise{{ {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }'  \ottsym{=}  { \mathit{out}_p }  \ottsym{(}    [  \gamma_G ,  \gamma_G'  ]    \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}}%

 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_A }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{in}_p }  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{out}_p }  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }  \ottsym{)} ,   [  \gamma_G ,  \gamma_G'  ]  ,  \overrightarrow{\Phi} ,  { C } ,   p_{ \mathrm{fin} }  ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{+}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  { {\gamma}_\mathit{A} }'  \ottsym{)} ,   [  \gamma_G  ]  ,   { [ \; ]_A }  ,  { C } ,    { \mathbf{run} }   ) }{%

\newcommand{\ottdefnarchXXred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ { \mathit{ctx}_\mathit{A} }  \vdash (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} } ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L ,  \ottnt{arch\_frame\_list} ,  { C } ,   t  ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} }' ,  \overrightarrow{ {\gamma} }_L' ,  \ottnt{arch\_frame\_list'} ,  { C }' ,   t'  ) $}{\ottcom{architecture-level semantics}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdrulearchXXcontrolXXret{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}
